cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of each combat, choose any number of noncreature artifacts you control. Until end of turn, those chosen artifacts become artifact creatures with base power and toughness equal to their mana value plus 1.
{X}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact with mana value X until Granny Hagfoot leaves the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You smell of fear, little one. A tasty scent.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Affinity for artifacts [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)[/i]
Trample
Whenever Hagfoot's Hut deals combat damage to an opponent, create that many 1/1 green Furniture artifact creature tokens.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You think you know where it's going? So did the last fellow. And now he's part of the floorboards. Or possibly the roof...” —Granny Hagfoot[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Granny's Cauldron enters with three Dose counters on it.
{T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Granny's Cauldron.
{T}, Remove a Dose counter: Move all non-dose counters from Granny's Cauldron onto another target creature.
Sacrifice Granny's Cauldron if it has no Dose counters on it.

Menace
Equipped creature gets -0/-2 and can't be blocked.
Reconfigure—Pay 2 life. [i](Pay 2 life: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A body is such a fragile thing. So easily broken, so easily... shared.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Skip-Jack attacks, you may exchange the power and toughness of target creature with the power and toughness of another target creature until end of turn.
Whenever Skip-Jack deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Straw and bone, a grinning fright,
He robs your soul, in the pale moonlight.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
When Wall of Junk blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. [i](Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Each piece tells a story. None of which have a happy ending.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Agent of Treachery enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more permanents that you don't own, draw three cards.

Whenever a noncreature artifact you control becomes a creature for the first time each turn, draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Target artifact creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“These trinkets once served kings. Now, they serve me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender, menace
Whenever an artifact enters under your control, you gain 2 life.
Sacrifice an artifact: Relicbound Sentinel may attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It once guarded treasures, but over the centuries it's learned to hoard them instead.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you gain control of an artifact you don't own, create a 1/1 blue Homunculus creature token with “Sacrifice this creature: Scry 1.”
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Exchange control of target noncreature artifact you don't control and target artifact you control until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Everything has a price. Sometimes, that price is simply looking away.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target artifact from an opponent's graveyard. If you do, create a Treasure token.
{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 1/1 black and green Squirrel Zombie creature token with deathtouch.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She gathers what others leave behind—whether they meant to or not.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender, Reach
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Lantern-Stalker Willow may attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
Whenever Lantern-Stalker Willow deals combat damage to an opponent, you may return an artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
{T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. [i](You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever you gain control of a permanent you don't own, you may exile target nonland permanent card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as you control Hollow-Warren Wight, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The dead don't rest in Granny's woods. They simply... Wait.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink, Trample
Whenever you sacrifice a creature or an artifact, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
{1}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Gain control of target nonland permanent you don't control with less than or equal to the mana value of the sacrificed creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She calls the lost and the desperate, and they never leave alone.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature or artifact left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 black Insect creature token with menace.
{T}, Sacrifice an Insect: Target opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Nothing in these woods is truly forgotten. She makes sure of that.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever another creature deals combat damage to an opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It doesn't howl at the moon—it waits until you scream.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may tap or untap target creature.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The deeper you go, the harder it is to leave.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]The forest reclaims all, even the forgotten trinkets of foolish wanderers.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.rules_text: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It sings of possibility, turning single moments into harmonious crescendos.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a Clue, Food, and Treasure token. Each token created this way enters as an X/X artifact creature in addition to its other types.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The vendors of the Midnight Market don't ask where the wares came from—only what you're willing to pay.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Lost children and trinkets—The forest finds a use for both.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Search your library for a basic land or an artifact card with mana value 3 or less. Then reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your library.

cards.rules_text: Destroy all creatures and artifacts with mana value 3 or less. Then, for each permanent destroyed this way, create Food token.

cards.rules_text: Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, you may draw a card.
